title: [Ta'Vaalor, Aethenireas Wey]
description: Several small cottages line the street.  Most are painted a clean white with a deep forest green trim.  Simple shutters are currently wide open on the cottages, their green paint vibrant in the light.  A few of the cottages sport copper guttering along their rooflines.

Several small cottages line the street.  Most are painted a clean white with a deep forest green trim.  Simple shutters are currently wide open on the cottages, their green paint subdued in the darkness.  A few of the cottages sport copper guttering along their rooflines.

Several small cottages line the street, their white-painted exteriors marred by streaks of soot and grime.  Across the wey from the cottages, a small shop has succumbed entirely to the fire, its sloped roop collapsed upon its demolished foundation.  Workers diligently pick through the rubble, while a number of guards watch over the area, eyes alert and weapons ready.

Several small cottages line the street, most painted a clean white with a deep forest green trim.  Across the wey stands a large white limestone building with a flat, tiled roof.  The building boasts wide doulbe doors painted in a dark green hue, next to which is posted a small silver sign.  A tidy herb garden lines the front of the building beneath a row of wide windows.

Several small cottages line the street, most painted a clean white with a deep forest green trim.  Across the wey stands a large white limestone building with a flat, tiled roof.  The building boasts wide double doors painted in a dark green hue, next to which is posted a small silver sign.  A tidy herb garden lines the front of the building beneath a row of wide windows.
